DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetic property topically apply MTC896 Gel follow application 0.75 % ( w/w ) MTC896 Gel daily twice daily 1.5 % ( w/w ) daily 4 week treatment acne .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study MTC896 Gel Subjects With Acne
